name: Rebellion Chain
description:
Playing around with a concept of a multi-character control platformer project :)

*** Now with TWO levels - My top score is 139, So the question is, can you beat me? *** 

Added Score (+1 for stars, -1 for losing a tribe member). What's your top score?

*** Please let me know if this lags on your pc at all, especially now with the zoom in and out feature! 

Story-

The story revolves around a wizard named Marquez who accidentally gains control of his tribe by using a control spell in reverse. Under your control, you must help your tribe collect magic stars. If you do not follow the laws of witchcraft, you will be imprisoned in the ancient world of wizards for your misuse of spells.

Can you be the next wizard of enchantment or face the wrath of demigods?

*** This is a Work in Progress (WIP) project that I will build upon over the next few weeks as I have time and can play with ideas. 

Current ideas:

 * Mission is to get to the end of the level with as many members left of the tribe.

 * Collectables along course - some requiring splitting up tribal members?

 * Spikes to avoid (above and below)

 * Lava? - Gotta have that in a game right? 

* Enemies to avoid? 

* Moving platforms / Lifts? - Not sure how expensive that will be for so many collision checks.

 * Music & sounds :)
